title: 133 - Vaccines = Krispy Kremes
description: On today's show, the guys chat about Zach Snyder's cut of The Justice League that's over 4 hours and is now available on HBO Max and the guys break down whether or not it's worth the time investment. Also included on today's show is Mitt now believing that Chad Johnson doesn't eat as much McDonald's as he says he does, the Japanese sweet treats make a triumphant return, and more. Plus they dive into a loaded Pod FOD including McDonald's new meatball sandwich making waves in Japan, aliens are back and possibly swimming in fish tanks everywhere, some MAJOR Fast & Furious 9 news, and much much more. As always, to get your Pod FOD questions on the show, send them to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, and follow the Youtube channel to watch full episodes of the show. We appreciate you guys for listening, we'll see you Friday.
